"Whirlwind Skyscape Probe":
"Oh, <%me>. Did you actually get
an unrestricted exploration permit for the Skyscape?
Hm... Well, if you're really an ARKS op of that caliber,
then this mission should be a walk in the park for you.
Complete "Skyscape Probe" within 20 minutes and
with an S Rank. And on Hard difficulty, too.
C'mon, it's time to show me what you've got!

*Complete the mission within 20 minutes and
earn an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."

"あ、<%me>！
聞いたわよ。アンタ浮遊大陸の自由探索許可
もらったんだって？
ふーん……そんなにすごいアークスなら
私の出した条件なんて楽勝よね？
ズバリ、浮遊大陸探索のハードを
20分以内でＳランククリア！
アンタの今の強さ、私に見せてちょうだい！

※ハード以上、20分以内にＳランククリア"
